product_name: Merrell Kilvoy Carry-on Duffel Bag - 2014 Closeout
long_description: With metal and real leather finishes, the Kilvoy Carry-on features dual, padded laptop / tablet sleeves and plenty of storage to help you stay organized and dapper on more civilized adventures.
short_description: With metal and real leather finishes, the Kilvoy Carry-on features dual, padded laptop / tablet sleeves and plenty of storage to help you stay organized and dapper on more civilized adventures.
